pullRequest.title: Added Energized Capacitor (From Discord suggestion)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Added the energized energy capacitor from an approved Discord suggestion. Note: NOT TESTED
Changes
Added energized energy capacitor.
Related Issues
N/A
Checklist



 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.

commit.message: Made energized capacitor tier 3 (Did I miss any code?)

nodes.bodyText: Please follow the existing order of ascending ids, otherwise someone who adds a new research at the bottom will miss this ONE single misplaced research inbetween with a much higher id.
4 Nether stars is quite expensive for something that can be substituted with 8 carbonado capacitors.

commit.message: Moved some code and changed energized capacitor recipe
